recipesJson.name: PB Crunch Berries
recipesJson.author: soulchkn
recipesJson.description:
Here's another delicious Cereal profile.
PB Crunch Berries is something we all know and love. Crunchy Cereal, creamy Peanut Butter & fresh Berries make for a great breakfast combo, wanting you to slurp up the sweet silky Milk as you reach the bottom of the bowl and licking it clean.
HAPPY MIXING, & HAPPY VAPING!!! :)
